title: Systems Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Bhutan-Style Human Resource Development and Planning through Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can write a human resource development plan reflecting cultural context for Bhutanese business environments.
Learners can analyze organizational competency gaps and propose solutions through experiential learning activities.
Learners can evaluate the cultural applicability of human resource development strategies based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
